00021 #include "calvin_files/parsers/test/DataSetReaderTest.h"

00023 #include "calvin_files/parsers/src/DataGroupHeaderReader.h"
00024 #include "calvin_files/parsers/src/DataSetReader.h"

00027 #include "util/Fs.h"

00030 #define TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE "../data/test.file.data_dat"
00031 
00032 using namespace std;
00033 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00034 
00035 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataSetReaderTest );
00036 
00037 void DataSetReaderTest::setUp()
00038 {
00039   Fs::aptOpen(is, TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE, std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00040 
00041         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00042         fhReader.Read();
00043 
00044         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00045         dchReader.ReadAll(is, fh, fhReader.GetDataGroupCnt());
00046 }
00047 
00048 void DataSetReaderTest::tearDown()
00049 {
00050         is.close();
00051         fh.Clear();
00052 }
00053 
00054 void DataSetReaderTest::CreationTest()
00055 {
00056         DataSetHeader& dph = fh.GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(0);
00057         DataSetReader reader(is, dph);
00058         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00059 }
00060 
00061 void DataSetReaderTest::ReadDataSetTest()
00062 {
00063         DataSetHeader& dph = fh.GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(0);
00064         DataSetReader reader(is, dph);
00065 
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(reader.GetDataSetName() == L"acquired data");
00067 
00068         int32_t rows = dph.GetRowCnt();
00069         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00070         {
00071                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00072                 u_int16_t value;
00073                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(value));
00074                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00075         }
00076 }
